model.weapon.actions

Interface Action

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Visitable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DamageAction, MarkAction, MovementAction

    public interface Action
extends Visitable, java.io.Serializable

        Returns:

      • getToTile

        ForcedMovement getToTile()
        return what kind of movement have the actions (only for movementAction)
        Returns:
        if it's forced to a particular player, a specific tile or it's not restricted
